weka.knowledgeflow.steps

Class TimeSeriesForecasting

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.knowledgeflow.steps.BaseStep
      • weka.knowledgeflow.steps.TimeSeriesForecasting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, BaseStepExtender, Step

    @KFStep(name="TimeSeriesForecasting",
        category="TimeSeries",
        toolTipText="Encapsulates a time series forecasting model and uses it to produce forecasts given incoming historical data. Forecaster can optionally be rebuilt using the incoming data before a forecast is generated.",
        iconPath="weka/gui/knowledgeflow/icons/DefaultClassifier.gif")
public class TimeSeriesForecasting
extends BaseStep
    Knowledge Flow step that encapsulates a time series forecasting model and uses it to produce forecasts given incoming historical data.
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Mark Hall
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
